ygData.subject: RE: GZ answers
ygData.msgSnippet: i didn t realize what he meant when he said no message to the environment. guess that would address the success message with no effect.  still does not explain
ygData.messageBody:
i didn't realize what he meant when he said no message to the environment.
guess that would address the success message with no effect. still does not
explain having no effect on mobs many many levels lower, as rokenn tested.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> Actually, many of the answers are exactly what I expected
> with the added bonus that it is confirmed
> they'll eventually be fixing certain things (meditate times,
> giving a resist message on that 2nd saving
> throw for lullaby/pixie's).
